name: Loli Fantasy RPG
description:
Well this game has been in the works for a while and suffered lots of changes quite noticeable yet still has the same spirit as when it started.

This is an adventure RPG so expect to battle enemies and explore different areas.

This has some stuff added as a hunger meter and a thirst meter so you have to be carefull or you will die while exploring.

In the current state it has a 2 or 3 hours of gameplay.

Remember if you enjoy it give us a donation to continue the game (development is time consuming and to have time we need money)
